channel.title: Posts on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Hugo website

item.title: RStudio Cloud to Github to Website
item.description: It works!! But first it doesn’t Yesterday I took some notes from a R Markdown workshop at R/Medicine 2019 and wanted to post them to my website. I ran into troubles! I wanted to start making blogging from within RStudio Cloud easy. I use a Chromebook, and it isn’t easy to install R into my particalar Chromebook, though other Chromebooks have the capacity. I also am a huge RStudio Cloud user, so wanted to finally integrate my blogdown blog with my Rstudio Cloud and Github accounts.

item.title: R-Medicine Conference: Day 1
item.description: R Markdown for Medicine Attended a workshop by Alison Hill. Here are some of my notes to future self to play with later. Figure Labelling auto distill package html_document2 yaml output xaringan posterdown stargazer table making different themes (berlin, roma) project management flexdashboard redoc spelling wordcountaddin htmlwidgets for R leaflet gitlab DataTables revealjs Figure out how to… Bookdown: how to combine multiple .Rmd into a “book” Make a powerpoint presenation from Rmarkdown (my work is heavy in ppt) Best practices Project Use here package Have a folder for figures to print to and save Resources https://commonmark.

item.title: Goals as a chief resident
item.description: Tomorrow Tomorrow is my first day as the chief pediatric resident at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center in NYC. I have lots of goals for the year, but knowing how chaotic life is in the hospital, I wanted to make sure I wrote them down before they are forgotten! I often find the workflow in hospitals is so busy that it is often to just hard enough to survive the day without building the foundation to try to have more good days.

item.title: The first post of the new website
item.description: This is my first post on my new website built with the R package blogdown, the help of many online help pages, and my lovely husband. I am using Github and Netlify as well. I don’t have the energy to write a post about how I built this, but here is the list of things that caused pain: in my config.toml file I had replaced the baseurl default of baseurl = "
